resources.string: This application requires Google play service to work. Please install Google play services or update if already present.
PGP Root Explorer helps you to encrypt all your files.\n The aim of this application is to provide Pretty Good Privacy encryption on Android devices.
PGP Root Explorer provides impervious security.\n Your keys will be stored in encrypted database \n and Private key is also self encrypted.

PGP Root Explorer encryption keys are unique for every user so backup of your keys because in case of app uninstall or data clear you must have keys to decrypt your data backing up keys is your own responsibility
Note: You can use your keys generated by GnuPG
First using the application, generate new key pair
